ValidationRule.description: Fields required to close the Product Migration Task.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Product_Migration", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed"),
OR(
ISBLANK(Description), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Response__c ,""), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Disposition__c,""), ISBLANK( Subject)
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Subject, Customer Response, Comments and Lead Disposition are required to close the task.
